# GenerationSchema

**Structure**

A type that describes the properties of an object and any guides on their values.

## Declaration

```swift
struct GenerationSchema
```

## Overview

Generation  schemas guide the output of a [doc://com.apple.foundationmodels/documentation/FoundationModels/SystemLanguageModel] to deterministically ensure the output is in the desired format.

## Creating a generation schema

- **init(root:dependencies:)**: Creates a schema by providing an array of dynamic schemas.
- **init(type:description:anyOf:)**: Creates a schema for a string enumeration.
- **init(type:description:properties:)**: Creates a schema by providing an array of properties.
- **GenerationSchema.Property**: A property that belongs to a generation schema.

## Getting the debug description

- **debugDescription**: A string representation of the debug description.

## Getting the generation schema error types

- **GenerationSchema.SchemaError**: A error that occurs when there is a problem creating a generation schema.

## Getting the schema

- **generationSchema**: An instance of the generation schema.

## Conforms To

- CustomDebugStringConvertible
- Decodable
- Encodable
- Sendable
- SendableMetatype
